TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit AppDomainInfo extends System.Object implements class System.Web.Hosting.IAppDomainInfo

Docs.summary: Provides information about the application domain.

remarks.format: ## Remarks AppDomainInfo is introduced in the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]. For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance string GetId() cil managed

remarks.format: ## Remarks GetId is introduced in the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]. For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance string GetPhysicalPath() cil managed

Docs.summary: Gets the physical path of the application domain.
Docs.returns: The physical path of the application domain.

remarks.format: ## Remarks GetPhysicalPath is introduced in the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]. For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance int32 GetSiteId() cil managed

Docs.summary: Gets the site ID of the application domain.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance string GetVirtualPath() cil managed

remarks.format: ## Remarks GetVirtualPath is introduced in the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]. For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool IsIdle() cil managed

Docs.summary: Gets the idle state of the application domain.
Docs.returns: if the application domain is idle; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks IsIdle is introduced in the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]. For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
